Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory614.jpg'}
{3: 'The two trudge on until they reach the end of the path.'}
{3: "At some point, the Red Tide had already flooded into the ocean. You're only able to this Red Tide-covered world now because your consciousness is connected to Nanami's."}
{3: 'The gray-haired girl furrows her brow as she calibrates the coordinates on her terminal.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'It\'s a point in the "future," but these aren\'t the right coordinates.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Have all humans vanished from this world?', 3: '10'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I came too late.', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's not your fault, Nanami.", 3: '13', 4: '...', 5: '13'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'By the time Nanami rushed here, the Red Tide had already merged with the ocean, and everyone was gone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "The ocean is the largest body of water on Earth, covering approximately 70% of the planet's surface...", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Nanami', 3: "As time passed, humanity's numbers dwindled. Some vanished into the ocean depths, while others died because of the increasing concentrations of the Punishing Virus in the air.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'And after that...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory460.jpg'}
{3: 'A crimson ocean engulfed the entire Earth, leaving no survivors among those who fought in the war.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory577.jpg'}
{3: 'With nowhere left to stand on Earth, Nanami had no choice but to leave the Solar System.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory614.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "...But don't worry, Commandant! This is just a simulated world!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After adjusting the coordinates on her terminal, she holds her hand out at you.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Let's begin our next adventure!", 4: '1'}
